replenish_members_on_exit_ghost.description: [bool]Respawn all members when exiting ghost mode.

catch_up_start_distance.description: Members will start navigating individually when this far from squad.

catch_up_stop_distance.description: Members will stop navigating individually when this far from squad.

cohesion_multiplier.description: A multiplier used to controll cohesion between squad members. Higher values means more cohesion.

squad_type.description: Defines what kind of behaviours should be run by the squad.
